stimulusHtml: Find all values of x on the open interval 0<x<8 for which the function f has a local minimum. Justify your answer.

features.html: The figure above shows the graph of f' the derivative of a twice-differentiable function f, on the closed interval 0 ≤ x ≤ 8 . The graph of f' has horizontal tangent lines at x=1, x=3, and x=5. The areas of the regions between the graph of f' and the x-axis are labeled in the figure. The function f is defined for all real numbers and satisfied f(8)=4.
